button.name: accountingMoveBtn
button.title: Accounting.toAccount
button.prompt: By clicking on this button, if validity conditions are satisfied and depending on the status of the move(s) selected, move(s) status will be updated. Depending if Daybook option is activated which will bring a status before the move being Accounted, please be aware that Accounting a move brings irrevocable integration of the move in their respective moves book. Do you wish to continue ?

field.name: functionalOriginSelect
field.hideIf: journal.authorizedFunctionalOriginSelect.split(',').length == 1 && journal.authorizedFunctionalOriginSelect == functionalOriginSelect || journal.authorizedFunctionalOriginSelect == null && functionalOriginSelect == null

label.name: $userNotAuthorizedOnJournal
label.title: Warning, you're not authorized to edit moves on this journal.

field.name: dueDate
field.title: Due date
field.help: This field allows to modify directly the move line due date which is by default calculated based on the payment condition.

field.name: $pfpViewerTags
field.viewer:
<>
	                        	{(statusSelect == 2 || statusSelect == 3) && pfpValidateStatusSelect == 1 && <Badge bg="warning">{_t('Awaiting PFP')}</Badge>}
	                        	{(statusSelect == 2 || statusSelect == 3) && pfpValidateStatusSelect == 2 && <Badge bg="success">{_t('PFP validated')}</Badge>}
	                        	{(statusSelect == 2 || statusSelect == 3) && pfpValidateStatusSelect == 3 && <Badge bg="danger">{_t('Litigation')}</Badge>}
	                        </>

button.name: counterpartGenerateBtn
button.title: Generate counterpart
button.showIf: journal != null && statusSelect != 3 && ([1,2,4].includes(journal.journalType.technicalTypeSelect) && functionalOriginSelect && (functionalOriginSelect == 3 || functionalOriginSelect == 4 || functionalOriginSelect == 7))

panel-related.name: moveLineListPanel
panel-related.showIf: (statusSelect == 1 || statusSelect == 2 || statusSelect == 5) && journal && currency && company && date && period

panel-related.name: moveLineListPanel
panel-related.showIf: (statusSelect == 3 || statusSelect == 4) && journal && currency && company && date && period

field.name: $reconcileTags
field.viewer: <><Badge style={{ backgroundColor: "#EF9D3F" }}>{_t('It is not possible to edit the amount of a reconciled and/or lettered accounting move line.')}</Badge></>

field.name: isHiddenMoveLinesInBankReconciliation
field.title: Hide move lines in bank reconciliation

field.name: isHiddenMoveLinesInBankReconciliation
field.title: Hide move lines in bank reconciliation

attribute.name: domain
attribute.expr: eval: "self.id IN (${company?.bankDetailsList?.collect{it.id}.join(',')},${company?.defaultBankDetails?.id}) AND self.active = true AND self.journal = :journal"

check.error: A cancel reason must be selected

filter.name: move-filters-current-period-entries
filter.title: Current Period Entries
filter.domain: self.period IS NULL OR (CURRENT_DATE >= self.period.fromDate and CURRENT_DATE <= self.period.toDate)

filter.name: move-filters-moves-to-export
filter.title: Moves to export
filter.domain: self.ignoreInAccountingOk = false AND self.journal.notExportOk = false AND self.accountingOk = false
